bug.author: HWiese1980
bug.summary: [v1.2.1] POSE_COCO_BODY_PARTS not available through the API anymore
bug.description: Hi everyone, until recently I've been using POSE_COCO_BODY_PARTS that had been defined in poseParameters.hpp to get the names of the body parts corresponding to their index. As of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/commit/b3c04ec0d475f15c05a4e2140da28961092adc90>b3c04ec</denchmark-link> that array isn't available anymore and I wonder how I'm supposed to get the body part name per body part index now. I'd be happy if anyone could elaborate on that change. Cheers!

comments.comment: Sorry, the doc was outdated. Please, check the latest version of doc/output.md and feel free to ask any confusing part of it. Thanks!
